name: LibreSpeed
short_description: Self-hosted internet speed test with detailed metrics and no tracking.
description: LibreSpeed is a free, open-source speed test that you can self-host on your server. It measures download and upload speeds, ping, and jitter with detailed results - no ads, no tracking, and no Flash required. Features include simple installation, multiple test files, ISP info detection, results history (when using a backend), and a clean interface. Perfect for testing your home network performance, comparing ISP speeds, or monitoring network quality over time. Can also be used to test speed between locations.
usecases: Test your home internet connection speed privately.
Monitor network performance over time with regular tests.
Test speed between different network locations.
Share a private speed test with your ISP for troubleshooting.
notes: No tracking or data collection - runs entirely locally
Works on desktop and mobile browsers
